title: Specify pose of BDI foot frames in User Guide

content.raw: As also asked on [Gazebo Answers](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/2650/drcsim-where-on-the-feet-are-the-bdi-feet-frames/). The pose of the feet is reported relative to the BDI-internal world frame in the [atlas_msgs/AtlasSimInterfaceState](#!/osrf/drcsim/raw/default/ros/atlas_msgs/msg/AtlasSimInterfaceState.msg) message. It however appears that the actual location of the foot frame with regards to the foot geometry is specified nowhere. It would be great if this information was added to the [User Guide](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/UserGuide).
